family_oriented.reason: The attraction is family-friendly, engaging children and accommodating families with personalized experiences.

history_oriented.reason: The rides provide detailed historical commentary and pass through significant landmarks, offering an educational experience.

activity_oriented.reason: The activity level is low, as the rides are leisurely and require no physical exertion.

nature_oriented.reason: The rides focus on urban historical areas with minimal natural scenery.

food_oriented.reason: The attraction does not include food-related activities as a core part of the experience.

shopping_oriented.reason: The rides are not related to shopping and focus on sightseeing and historical exploration.
